start.text: You wake up in a small clearing. Two paths lie ahead.

left_path.text: You find an old cabin. A lantern rests on a table.

right_path.text: A river blocks the way. You cannot cross without a lantern.

inside_cabin.text: With the lantern you explore the cabin and find a map. This is the end of the demo.

river_fail.text: You cannot cross the river without light. You return defeated.
